section.name: Generation
section.p: The parsing component AdqlStoX is generated from a JavaCC module named AdqlStoX.jjt, named because the JavaCC framework generates from it AdqlStoX, as well as a fairly full syntax tree of modules all of whose names start with the prefix AST_. If you wish to see the main structure of ADQL as a language, the AdqlStoX.jjt file is the one to study. It is heavily commented to pick out the main BNF structure of the language.
Within the Maven build the code generation plugin is commented out.

If you wish to build by hand, I recommend the Eclipse JavaCC plugin, which makes development a whole lot easier. Otherwise, you must read the JavaCC documentation to configure a command line execution of the generator.

li.a: Read about the Eclipse JavaCC plugin here.
